mapper.select: SELECT C.EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, C.COMMUTE_INTIME, C.COMMUTE_OUTTIME, C.COMMUTE_STATUS,C.COMMUTE_MSG FROM COMMUTE C LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM ORDER BY C.COMMUTE_INTIME DESC
SELECT C.EMP_NUM, E.EMP_NAME, C.COMMUTE_INTIME, C.COMMUTE_OUTTIME, C.COMMUTE_STATUS FROM COMMUTE C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE C.EMP_NUM = #{empNum} ORDER BY C.COMMUTE_INTIME DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUTE SET COMMUTE_OUTTIME =NOW(), COMMUTE_STATUS = 2 WHERE EMP_NUM = #{empNum} AND COMMUTE_OUTTIME IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUTE WHERE EMP_NUM = #{empNum} AND DATE(COMMUTE_INTIME) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUTE WHERE EMP_NUM = #{empNum} AND DATE(COMMUTE_INTIME) = CURDATE() AND COMMUTE_OUTTIME IS NULL
SELECT E.*,C.* FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM COMMUTE C WHERE date(COMMUTE_INTIME)=CURRENT_DATE )C USING (EMP_NUM) WHERE COMMUTE_NUM IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUTE (EMP_NUM, COMMUTE_INTIME, COMMUTE_OUTTIME, COMMUTE_STATUS,COMMUTE_MSG) SELECT E.EMP_NUM, NOW(), NULL, 0 ,'자동 결근 처리 되었습니다' FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN COMMUTE C ON E.EMP_NUM = C.EMP_NUM WHERE DATE(C.COMMUTE_INTIME) IS NULL OR DATE(C.COMMUTE_INTIME) != CURRENT_DATE ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE COMMUTE_INTIME = NOW(), COMMUTE_OUTTIME = NULL, COMMUTE_STATUS = 0, COMMUTE_MSG='자동 결근 처리 되었습니다';
